text: Exmetjan Ekber (born 17 January 1993) is a Uyghur-Chinese footballer. ==Club career== Exmetjan started his professional football career in 2012 when he was promoted to China League Two side Xinjiang Xiyu Grand Begonia's squad. He scored three goals in twenty-two appearances in the 2012 season. However, he became an unattached player after Xinjiang quit from the league in 2013 due to financial difficulties. He was included China League One club Xinjiang Tianshan Leopard's reserve team squad in 2014. Exmetjan was signed by China League One side Yanbian Changbaishan on 28 February 2015 after a successful trial. He made his debut for Yanbian on 16 April 2015 in a 2015 Chinese FA Cup match against amateur team Suzhou Jinfu New Materials. He played just one minute in the 2015 China League One as Yanbian won the title of the league and promoted to the first tier. On 16 July 2016, Exmetjan made his Super League debut in a 3–0 home victory against Jiangsu Suning, coming on for Jin Bo in the 76th minute. He scored his first goal for Yanbian one minute after his substitution. On 22 February 2018, Exmetjan transferred to China League One club Nei Mongol Zhongyou following the relegation of Yanbian Funde. ==Career statistics== Statistics accurate as of match played 31 December 2019. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=3|Xinjiang Xiyu Grand Begonia||2012||China League Two||22||3||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||22||3 |- |2013||-||colspan="2"|-||2||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||2||0 |- ! colspan=2 | Total !22!!3!!2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!24!!3 |- |rowspan=4|Yanbian Funde||2015||China League One||1||0||1||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||2||0 |- |2016||rowspan="2"|Chinese Super League||4||1||1||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||5||1 |- |2017||2||0||1||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||3||0 |- ! colspan=2 | Total !7!!1!!3!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!10!!1 |- |rowspan=3|Nei Mongol Zhongyou||2018||rowspan=2|China League One||15||0||1||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||16||0 |- |2019||0||0||1||1||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||1||1 |- ! colspan=2 | Total !15!!0!!2!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!17!!1 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total ! 44||4||7||1||0||0||0||0||51||5 |} ==Honours== Yanbian FC * China League One: 2015 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Uyghur sportspeople Category:People from Kashgar Category:Chinese footballers Category:Footballers from Xinjiang Category:Association football midfielders Category:Yanbian Funde F.C. players Category:Inner Mongolia Zhongyou F.C. players Category:Chinese Super League players Category:China League One players Category:China League Two players
